Manage Programs

Manage Programs

SheerID offers an easy-to-use, self-service application that allows you to select your target audience segment, compose your offer, and measure resultsâ€”all within one interface. This document provides a step-by-step walkthrough of how to set up and optimize the performance of your exclusive offer programs.

Install

Copy and paste the code snippet into your website

<a data-sheerid-iframe="true" href="https://preview.sheerid.com/verify/5c0d45f251cc4d31b7a222ca/">Confirm Eligibility</a> <script src="https://services-sandbox.sheerid.com/jsapi/SheerID.js"></script> <script> SheerID.setBaseUrl("https://services-sandbox.sheerid.com/jsapi"); SheerID.load('iframe', '1.2', { config : { lightbox: true, mobileRedirect: false, mobileThreshold: 600, top: '25px', closeBtnRight: '25px' } }); </script>

Account

Users

Access Tokens

In order to generate the Access Tokens tab, you must first have API access granted to you by an admin for your company.
